Pre-Game Insights: France's match against Italy in the Nations League will be played at the Parc des Princes on September 6, 2024.
The French team will need to make a fine start to the competition to build up their confidence, after a lacklustre Euro, which saw them beaten in the semi-finals.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tickets are still available for the match starting at 79 euros.
The match will be played at 8:45pm at the Parc des Princes.
Others: Les Bleus' first opponents in the group phase are Italy, Belgium and Israel.
The Nations League is back! On September 6 and 9, 2024, Les Bleus will play their first group matches of the competition against Italy and Belgium.
